meanings.definition: Screwbeans: a type of bean commonly found in the southwestern United States.

meanings.definition: Screwbeans: to twist or turn something tightly.
meanings.sent1: I had to screwbeans the lid onto the jar to keep it sealed.
meanings.sent2: She used a wrench to screwbeans the bolts into place.
meanings.sent3: He tried to screwbeans the toy car back together, but it still wouldn't work.
meanings.sent4: The tornado seemed to screwbeans the trees out of the ground.
meanings.sent5: The chef had to carefully screwbeans the pepper grinder to get the spices out.

meanings.definition: Screwbeans: a slang term for a difficult or frustrating situation.
meanings.sent1: Dealing with that broken car was a real screwbeans.
meanings.sent2: Getting lost in the maze was a total screwbeans.
